Package homework2

Class SimulatorTestDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • homework2.SimulatorTestDriver

  • public class SimulatorTestDriver
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a testing driver for Simulator. The driver manages Simulators for payment channels

      • createSimulator

        public void createSimulator​(java.lang.String simName)
        Requires:
        simName is not null
        Modifies:
        this
        Effects:
        Creates a new simulator named simName. The simulator's graph is initially empty.

      • addChannel

        public void addChannel​(java.lang.String simName,
                       java.lang.String channelName,
                       double limit)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Requires:
        createSimulator(simName) and channelName is not null and channelName has not been used in a previous addChannel() or addParticipant() call on this object limit l.t. 0
        Modifies:
        simulator named simName
        Effects:
        Creates a new Channel named by the String channelName, with a limit, and add it to the simulator named simName.

      • addParticipant

        public void addParticipant​(java.lang.String simName,
                           java.lang.String participantName,
                           double fee)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Requires:
        createSimulator(simName) and participantName is not null and participantName has not been used in a previous addParticipant(), addChannel() call on this object fee l.t. 0
        Modifies:
        simulator named simName
        Effects:
        Creates a new Participant named by the String participantName and add it to the simulator named simName.

      • addEdge

        public void addEdge​(java.lang.String simName,
                    java.lang.String parentName,
                    java.lang.String childName,
                    java.lang.String edgeLabel)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Requires:
        createSimulator(simName) and ((addPipe(parentName) and addFilter(childName)) || (addFilter(parentName) and addPipe(childName))) and edgeLabel is not null and node named parentName has no other outgoing edge labeled edgeLabel and node named childName has no other incoming edge labeled edgeLabel
        Modifies:
        simulator named simName
        Effects:
        Adds an edge from the node named parentName to the node named childName in the simulator named simName. The new edge's label is the String edgeLabel.

      • sendTransaction

        public void sendTransaction​(java.lang.String simName,
                            java.lang.String channelName,
                            Transaction tx)
                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Requires:
        createSimulator(simName) and addChannel(channelName) A transaction Transaction is not null
        Modifies:
        channel named channelName
        Effects:
        pushes the Transaction into the channel named channelName in the simulator named simName.

      • listContents

        public java.lang.String listContents​(java.lang.String simName,
                                     java.lang.String channelName)
                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns:
        a space-separated list of the Transaction values currently in the channel named channelName in the simulator named simName.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Requires:
        addChannel(channelName)

      • getParticipantBalace

                                   java.lang.String participantName)
                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        The sum of all Transaction values stored in the storage of the participant participantName in the simulator simName

        Requires:

        Modifies:
